Bitstamp registered as a cryptoasset business by the Financial Conduct Authority in the UK
Bitstamp becomes an FCA-registered cryptoasset business in the UK, reaching a total of 52 licenses and registrations worldwide.
Introducing the first Bitstamp Earn Lending performance report – May 2023
Discover the first Crypto Lending Performance Report by Bitstamp, offering valuable insights into market trends and portfolio performance.
Say Hello to Waltio – Crypto Taxation Simplified via Bitstamp Connect
Bitstamp users residing in France and Spain can now enjoy worry-free crypto tax reporting services, automating accurate calculations and declarations.
Calling all bug hunters – Bitstamp’s public bug bounty program is open

Bitstamp launches a public bug hunting program to strengthen the security of its platform. Learn how to participate and earn rewards for uncovering valid vulnerabilities and contribute to a safer digital environment.
US BANK HOLIDAY: May 29, 2023 – incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments paused on Monday, May 29, 2023, due to a public holiday in the US.
EU Bank Holiday: May 1, 2023 – SEPA payments paused
Bitstamp SEPA payments paused on Monday, May 1, 2023, due to public holidays in the EU.
Once again, Bitstamp is the world’s top-rated centralized crypto exchange
Discover how Bitstamp maintains its No.1 rating as the most reliable and secure platform for crypto trading in CryptoCompare’s (now CCData) Exchange Benchmark report.
EU BANK HOLIDAYS: April 7 & April 10, 2023 – SEPA payments paused
Bitstamp SEPA payments paused on Friday, April 7, 2023, and Monday, April 10, 2023, due to public holidays in the EU.
Faster and easier signups with Prove
We are simplifying our registration and verification process in the US, making access to crypto even more straightforward
Ensuring a continued safe, secure and reliable trading environment
We are temporarily withdrawing Silvergate banking services for all Bitstamp users.
